welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maulavi Bazar, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shamshernagar Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Shamshernagar Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
